Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Racine/Belmont
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark: due to, street blockage near Racine/Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark: due to, street blockage near Racine/Belmont.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Pink Line Service Delayed at 54th/Cermak
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing at 54th/Cermak due to a sick customer.  Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing at 54th/Cermak due to a sick customer. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Normal Blue Line Service Restored
ShortDescription: Service on the Blue Line has resumed and trains are making all normal station stops following earlier fire department activity near O'Hare.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Blue Line has resumed and trains are making all normal station stops following earlier fire department activity near O'Hare.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #95 95th Temporary Reroute at 93rd/Jeffery
ShortDescription: 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 93rd, Jeffery, 92nd, Stony Island and 95th, due to street blockage near 93rd/Jeffery.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 93rd, Jeffery, 92nd, Stony Island and 95th, due to street blockage near 93rd/Jeffery.

Allow extra travel time.
